special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters the battlefield and after your draw step, put a lore counter on it. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create Syr Kinne, a legendary 3/2 white Human Knight creature token with first strike.
II – Put a flying counter and a vigilance counter on a creature you control named Syr Kinne.
III – Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Knights you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
